phrs.translation: 使感不便, 妨碍, 感不便, 打扰

sentences.sentence: But, also can give you incommode sometimes, produce plastic shoe dermatitis.
sentences.translation: 但是，有时也会给您添麻烦，发生塑料鞋。

sentences.sentence: We do not ask others to be faultless, we only ask their faults should not incommode to our own.
sentences.translation: 我们不要求他人完美无缺，我们只要求他们的缺陷不会妨碍我们。

sentences.sentence: "It is possible, " said the uncle, with great calmness. "For thehonour of the family, I could even resolve to incommode you to thatextent. Pray excuse me! "
sentences.translation: “有可能，”叔父极其平静地说，“为了家族的荣誉，我是可能下决心干扰你到那种程度的。请谅解。”
